game.title: Imperial Rome: Rise of Caesar
game.synopsis: Become the Emperor of Ancient Rome and expand your empire through military conquest, political alliances, and economic development.
game.beginning: In 73 BC, you begin as a noble in the Roman Republic and must navigate the tumultuous political landscape to seize power for yourself.
game.ending: Your ultimate goal is to rule the entire Mediterranean world, but beware of rival factions seeking to challenge your authority.
